channel.title: Makin myself admin
channel.description: where in client do i change it to my chars name so i am the owner/admin

item.title: Makin myself admin
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

if something in the server says something like : noob is the owner! and you want it to be brian2007 is the owner!, open up your client.java and look for what its saying by pressing ctrl + F, than change it to what u want it to be.

if a npc is calling it, do the same but in the NPChandler.java[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 22, 2008, 07:44:11 am[/size][hr]search for globalobj, with ctrl+ F and add in the list :
something like : makeglobalobject(XXXX, YYYY, %%%%, 0 ,-1 ) the XXXX = the X coord, the YYYY = the Y coord, %%%% is the id of the object you want to add.

Read full topic

item.title: Makin myself admin
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

go to the foler characters, search for yours an open it.
change character-rights to 3.

char rights 0 = player
char rights 1 = mod
char rights 2 = admin
char rights 3 = owner

Read full topic
